0152.name: Custom Pretendo Error
0152.message:
The online service is unavailable.
Please try again later.

For help, visit support.nintendo.com.
0152.long_description: The game server you are trying to connect to requires custom patches to protect its users against security vulnerabilities.
0152.short_solution: Download the latest version of Nimbus.
0152.long_solution: Since Nimbus 2.0.0, a new plugin containing custom patches for games is bundled with it. Download the latest version of Nimbus available to get the latest set of patches
